00036 /*..........................................................................*/
00037 void QS_str(char const *s) {
00038     QS_INSERT_BYTE((uint8_t)QS_STR_T)
00039     QS_chksum_ = (uint8_t)(QS_chksum_ + (uint8_t)QS_STR_T);
00040     while ((*s) != (char)'\0') {
00041                                     /* ASCII characters don't need escaping */
00042         QS_INSERT_BYTE((uint8_t)(*s))
00043         QS_chksum_ = (uint8_t)(QS_chksum_ + (uint8_t)(*s));
00044         ++s;
00045     }
00046     QS_INSERT_BYTE((uint8_t)0)
00047 }
00048 /*..........................................................................*/
00049 /*lint -e970 -e971            ignore MISRA rules 13 and 14 in this function */
00050 void QS_str_ROM(char const Q_ROM * Q_ROM_VAR s) {
00051     uint8_t b;
00052     QS_INSERT_BYTE((uint8_t)QS_STR_T)
00053     QS_chksum_ = (uint8_t)(QS_chksum_ + (uint8_t)QS_STR_T);
00054     while ((b = (uint8_t)Q_ROM_BYTE(*s)) != (uint8_t)0) {
00055                                     /* ASCII characters don't need escaping */
00056         QS_INSERT_BYTE(b)
00057         QS_chksum_ = (uint8_t)(QS_chksum_ + b);
00058         ++s;
00059     }
00060     QS_INSERT_BYTE((uint8_t)0)
00061 }
